post:
Hello,

Welcome to WebHosting UK VPS Hosting Services.

Our VPS Hosting plans are powered by Virtuozzo Power Panel, a powerful VPS management tool which is provided as an addon with all VPS packages for only £3 / Month.

Benefits of Virtuozzo Power Panel:
1. It allows you to reboot VPS from your end.
2. View Running Process
3. Stop and Start Services
4. Setup alerts etc
